overview: There is a COVID-19 epidemic in the country, a lockdown is being introduced in the regions, people are being urged to get vaccinated on TV, against this background, a simple entrepreneur, the owner of a small business and his employees, are faced with the problem of restrictions and the lack of customers, which leads to a halt in activities. Different ways of maintaining the business do not lead to a positive result, and he makes a cardinal decision that will change his future.
tagline: We wanted the best, it turned out - as always!
title: Business in Russian
